descriptionHtml:
Hello,

Just as the title says, I have uploaded a couple of my RaceMenu presets.
To be exact: there is 30 of them, although they do not differ from each other that much. They are all a mix of three different noses and ten different eyes.
Hopefully you will find at least one of them to your liking.

Just few important things that needs to be pointed out:

[list]
[*][u]Your character will NOT look exactly like mine even if you use those presets. They just won't.[/u] In order for them to look exactly like mine, you would also have to use [u]exactly [/u]the same textures, ENB and most probably even the same lighting mods as I do. As I use an edited versions of readily available mods - it is not probable that you will use the exact same ones mods and edited them in exactly the same way.
[/list]
[list]
[*][u]Hair/brows/makeup can change the impression of any preset drastically[/u]. If you don't like any of them then try to change a hair or add a makeup - who knows, maybe you will find one of my presets usable after all?
[/list]
[list]
[*]If you don't like my presets and you feel like you absolutely have to share that with others, feel free to comment, but it will not change much anyway. I do not plan any updates or changes and I doubt I will look into comments too much. I simply uploaded the presets that I use, because why not.
[/list]
[list]
[*]They were all [u]created while using Nord race[/u]. I am not sure if they will work on other races nor have I ever tried to, but somehow I doubt they will. Things are rarely so easy.
[/list]
[list]
[*][u]In the bottom-right corner of each image you can find the name of the preset [/u](i.e N1E12, N2E16 etc.) - the preset files in the uploaded archive have exactly the same names.
[/list]
Finally, below you can find a list (more or less) of mods I have used:

[list]
[*]Hair: KS Hairdos
[/list]
[list]
[*]Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty
[/list]
[list]
[*]Brows: SG Brows
[/list]
[list]
[*]Textures: A mix of SG Textures and UNP Creamy
[/list]
[list]
[*]Makeup/Tintmasks: The ones included in the Ningheim race
[/list]
And quite obviously: [u]RaceMenu[/u].

Like all RaceMenu presets, the files should go to: "Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets", or in case of ModOrganizer: "overwrite\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets" (or wherever you keep your presets).

Also, I don't think it needs to be said, but RaceMenu is quite obviously required to use any of those presets...

Enjoy. :)
author: trzcinaj
